ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: JFF thanks the University of Buenos Aires for a doctoral fellowship. We gratefully acknowledge the support of NVIDIA Corporation with the donation of the Titan X Pascal GPU used for this research and OpenEye for providing an academic license to use their suite. Also, we thank Dr. J. A. Palermo and Dra. V. Ferraresi Curotto for their invaluable help during this research.
